title: Avaada Group commits Rs 1 lakh cr investment in Rajasthan
description: Avaada Group plans to invest Rs 1 lakh crore in Rajasthan's renewable energy sector, funding projects like a 1.2 GW hydro storage, 1 MTPA green ammonia, 1 GW wind power, and 10 GW solar power. These initiatives will generate employment and support India's green energy goals.
